content=Bike rentals right on the harbour in Svendborg, in cooperation with the tourist information desk.

content=Svendborg has hosted an International Clown Festival for over a decade. For a week in mid May the town is full of exciting street performances. There is also a grand parade and a theatre gala show which is well worth trying to get tickets for. Clowns from all over the world gather the festival and perform around the town in various venues throughout the week as well as in the streets.
Ships of the Martime Center in the harbour

Svendborg is located at a beautiful fjord, or in correct terms the Svendborg Sound, and is a good starting point to explore the
archipelago. Several ferries connect to some of the islands from Svendborg, and there are also some pretty veteran tour boats to take you on short cruises in the area.

value: content=1 hour tour to Valdemar Slot (pictured) or a 2 hour return trip, also available for charter.

content=Does cruises around the archipelago south of the city, in beautiful old wooden ships during the summer (June-August) mainly in the weekends, but you can be lucky to catch a tour on other days, reservations is recommended. Also charters old sail ships to groups of more than 20 people.
content=Sea kayak rentals and guided tours in the archipelago.
content=Rents out several sail boats ranging from 7,77m to 8,30 m

content=Bistro Gourmand is our gastronomic contribution to the experience at Stella Maris - Hotel de Luxe. French inspired menu with ingredients from the Island of Vejrø, Fyn and the rest of the world. You will find wines from both large and small producers, mainly from France and Italy.
content=Stella Maris Hotel de Luxe is a luxurious experience located directly on the waters edge in Svendborg. 36 luxury rooms, meeting rooms, bar, terrace, wine cellar, farm shop & bistro gourmand.
directions=5 km out on the island of Tåsinge
